name: Pinocchio
description: This is about life of reporters how they are treated in real life, how they struggle to get a small information from people. All the ups and downs , with lots of politics involved , will they manage to become good reporters ???

name: I hear your voice
description: A guy who can hear people thoughts is somehow related in a crime and meets the person who saved him when he was a kid. How their life intersects and how he helps her get through her life!!!!

name: Doctor stranger
description: As a child Park Hoon and his father was tricked and sent to North Korea , after staying there Park Hoon learnt his medical knowledge from his father. He meets a girl in North Korea and tries to escape , they fail to escape together and only he comes back to South Korea . When he started working in a hospital he meets the girl whom he fell in love with, how will there relationship grow!!!

name: W- Two worlds
description: It takes place in two worlds , one in the real life where the girl is and the Webtoon where the guy is . She travels and ends up in a webtoon, which seems so real, will she realise that she is in a webtoon, how will she react and manage to survive

name: High Kick! The Revenge of the Short Legged
description: It's about Ahn family's financial hardship ,The series follows several subplots through to their conclusion.

name: No breathing
description: This is based on swimming, as always the rivalry and love and friendship. But with the plot and there acting it's really a sweet and compitative drama.

name: Young bloods
description: This is a movie which is set in a rural area, and it depicts the story of 4 people , there rivalry, love and friendship. How all this intersect in each other's life.

name: While you where sleeping
description: Lee Jong suck is a prosecutor who is helping people from the danger they are going to face with the help Bae Suzy who can see the future of people who are in danger.

name: School 2013
description: It's about twin sisters who get sperated when they where kids, how they meet again and will there meet be smooth sailing or rocky.
